name: The Surge: Augmented Edition
description: Survive the ultimate and extended experience of the hardcore action-RPG The Surge! The Augmented Edition includes the full game, all its expansions and all its DLCs.

name: ATV Drift & Tricks: Definitive Edition
description:
DRIFT, TRICKS & FUN!!

ATV Drift & Tricks is the QUAD game for you!

- Playable solo or in multiplayer with 8 wild game modes
- Varied tracks you can do over and over again
- Crazy stunts & drifts to the max

name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: The Game Boy Color version is a role-playing game with turn-based combat. The player controls Harry, starting from when Hagrid brings him to Diagon Alley. It strictly follows the story of the books, with all the scenes from that point on in the book being playable, except for the addition of bands of monsters such as rats, bats, and spiders roaming most of the locations. The spells are used for combat, rather than interacting with the environment. In addition, card combinations of Famous Witches and Wizards Collector's Cards can be used to produce powerful magical effects. These cards can be found all over the freely explorable Hogwarts.

name: Ginsei Mahjong
description: Sin descripción

name: Jurassic World Evolution: Deluxe Edition
description: Place yourself at the heart of the Jurassic franchise and build your own Jurassic World. Bioengineer dinosaurs that think, feel and react intelligently to the world around them and face threats posed by espionage, breakouts and devastating tropical storms in an uncertain world where life always finds a way.

name: Mission: Impossible
description: Sin descripción

name: Ted Nugent - Wild Hunting Adventure
description: Experience the thrill of the hunt with Ted Nugent. In this beautifully detailed 3-D hunting simulation, set in Nugent's Hunting World, Ted helps you bag exotic trophy game. Armed with an array of hunting gear, you stalk the most challenging and dangerous beasts of the wilderness, such as wild boar, grizzly bear, and buffalo. Study their droppings, markings, and scrapes to track them. Then select the right weapon to take them down.

name: At Sundown: Shots in the Dark - Avatar Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Wuppo: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Upgrade the game
description:
Upgrade the Game is a game where you can upgrade everything! From graphics,sound, music, menus, to your spaceship....EVERYTHING! 
 
Start from a poor game until you achieve the game complete!, Enjoy upgrading all parts of the game, you will need money that you get killing enemies spaceships but, be careful! If they pass the last line of defense you will lose the game! 
 
At the level 5 you will engage the Alien Commander 
 
Kill the enemies with your shoots and two skills: 
-Freeze the time 
-Invoke your image mirror 
 
Start from the simply of pixel to the graphics of the spaceships! 
 
A casual game for all publics where you can have fun for a time doin upgrades. 
 
Features: 
-Upgrade the interface including main menu, shop menu and tutorial 
-Upgrade the graphics of your ship , enemy ships, shoots, background and boss 
-Upgrade the shields,move speed, fire attack speed, speed of coin, the amount of coin and much more 
-Upgrade the skills,the times you can use it and how many time it is active 
-Achievements of all types 
-Decrease the chance of boss appear in the end of the round

name: Trials Rising: Digital Gold Edition
description:
Includes the Game & 55+ tracks with the Expansion Pass!
Explore over-the-top action and physics-bending motorcycle racing in the latest entry of the Trials franchise. With new tracks and more ways to compete, Trials Rising is easy to pick-up and play, challenging to master and offers the best multiplayer racing experience.

name: Prototype 2: Blackwatch Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The King of Fighters XIII: Gold Edition
description: Become the ultimate champion of the King of Fighters Tournament with this KOF XIII Gold Edition, including characters Iori with the Power of Flames, NESTS-style Kyo, Mr Karate, avatars, themes and level and character unlocks available only in DLC format!

name: Rocket Arena
description: Rockets rule everything in Rocket Arena, an explosive 3v3 shooter where you're never out of the action. Master your hero's unique rockets and abilities to rule the arena and become a champion. Let's Rocket!

name: Chess Challenger
description: A chess simulator that boasts the best chess AI on any game machine for its time of release.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition of Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown contains the base game, the Season Pass, and the 8 Popular Squadron Emblems DLC.

name: Override: Mech City Brawl - Super Charged Mega Edition
description: Override: Mech City Brawl is a 3D mech-based brawler. Control gigantic robots and duke it out in fantastic cityscapes. Epic battles await with distinctive mechs in 1v1 brawls, 4-person online free-for-all, or 2 to 4-player party co-op – where each player controls one part of two skyscraper-sized mechs. The game also features a single-player campaign to go it alone.

name: ACA Neo Geo: King of the Monsters 2
description: King of the Monsters 2 is an action game released by SNK in 1992. Choose 1 of 3 monsters to thrash aliens around the world and become the undisputed King of the Monsters! Work together in a 2 player co-op mode, or duke it out in versus mode!

name: ACA Neo Geo: 3 Count Bout
description: 3 Count Bout is a pro-wrestling game released by SNK in 1993. Aim to become the world's strongest wrestler, and take the champion's throne for yourself! Chock full of the elements of pro-wrestling, including strike exchanges and aerial assaults, dash moves, even illegal moves! Enjoy interesting matches including electricity matches, street matches, and more.

name: ACA Neo Geo: Metal Slug 5
description: Metal Slug 5 is an action shooting game released by SNK in 2003. The Ptolemaic Army has stolen some very confidential files! Choose from four familiar faces: Marco, Eri, Tarma, or Fio to take them down! Look forward to the new Slug Gunner and slide mechanic!

name: Color Rings Pro
description: Match at least three rings in a row with the same color or stack three rings of the same color.

name: ACA Neo Geo: Neo Geo Cup '98 - The Road to the Victory
description: Neo Geo Cup '98- The Road to the Victory is a soccer game released by SNK in 1998. Take control of a legendary soccer team and aim for the World Championship trophy! Choose the right power up to ensure your victory! Watch out for accidents during matches that can cause injury or even force players off the field!

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Nitros Oxide Edition
description: He’s the self-proclaimed fastest racer in the galaxy, Nitros Oxide! Purchase the Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled - Nitros Oxide Edition and get the Nitros Oxide playable character, Oxide’s Hovercraft, Space-themed Crash, Coco, and Cortex characters skins, and more.

name: Vosaria: Lair of the Forgotten
description: A pump-action 2D side-scrolling game with different enemy types. along with a jump-to-the-roof mechanic that spices up the combat.

name: Lightfield Hyper Edition
description: Lightfield Hyper Edition is a creative exploration racer, in which you discover futuristic racing tracks and leave the boundaries behind in parkour-inspired precision racing.

name: The Onion Knights: Definite Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Wild Western
description: Arcade Archives: Wild Western is a port of the action game Wild Western. Play as a horse-riding sheriff to deal justice with your pistol to the outlaws attacking you from all directions. There are even battles atop the roof of a train. Leap off your horse onto the roof of the train without falling, and shoot down the bad guys before they take over the train!

name: Jey's Empire
description: Play as legendary FBI patron J. Edgar Hoover in this historic strategy-RPG game.Fight against the mafia, the communists, the ku Klux, the black Panthers, the weatherman underground ... in the heart of the crazy sixties.

name: Variables
description: We created this unique single player game with a combination of Tower Defence and Roguelike. Come and create your maze, build your turret, defeat the invaders, and save the world!

name: Who Killed Her
description: A murder case in a boarding school. The killer is one of eight students remaining at the school. Who killed her?

name: Perfect Round Disc Golf
description: Perfect Round Disc Golf is a casual yet realistic interpretation of the sport of Disc Golf. Classic three click golf game play mechanics are easy to learn but hard to master, and will keep you searching for the perfect round.

name: Crypterion
description: Crypterion is an open-world visual novel in a distant future where anyone can rise to power—including you. As a new arrival in the Rimshot system, you are free to forge your own destiny, conquering space by mastery of trade, politics, celebrity status through galactic TV or... Other means.

name: Alien Cow Farm
description: Abduct as many cows as possible! Zoom around alien planets, luring and stealing cows from opponent UFOs while stopping them from taking your own. Set records and unlock achievements in a variety of single-player and multiplayer game modes as you grow your very own Alien Cow Farm!

name: Lootbox Lyfe
description: Lootbox Lyfe is a hardcore metroidvania platformer with idle game elements and satirical comedy.

name: Ufflegrim
description: Ufflegrim is a traditional roguelike with card-based, creature summoning combat. Every enemy is not only a challenge, but also a chance to capture unique allies and abilities for your deck. Take on the pilgrimage and travel to the bottom of the 100 floors.

name: Orx
description: Orx is a new take on the well-known tower defense genre, blending mechanics of popular deck building and tabletop games to create a truly unique experience. Grow your castle, expand your domain, and take a stand against hordes of green-skinned attackers!

name: First Day
description:
After a nuclear explosion, the planet was covered with a huge wave of atomic energy, which wiped out almost all life from the face of the earth.

From the land that we knew there were only stones, sand and debris ...

All the liquid on the planet has turned into alcohol.

The only plants that remained and were able to more or less adapt to the new atmosphere were the mutated cacti, the last drinking liquid remained in them.

Those few who miraculously survived were lucky enough to call it that, because now they have to hide from deadly sandstorms and crowds of zombies ...

name: Sandbox Anything
description: A creative building-like game, where the objective is to throw physics enabled objects to create structures to allow the objective of the level to be completed. Can be a very challenging puzzler or an easy, sit back and relax game.

name: Astronomy VR
description: A student get into a detailed simulated solar system: 10 planets, an Asteroid belt, satellites, and even space junk around the Earth.

name: My University
description: The colorful college life is about to begin. Welcome all the freshmen to enter the university and start the four-year college...

name: Lapya
description: In a ruined world where people and robots have retreated to the underground, Lapya has a mission - to keep their sun shining.

name: Alice in CyberCity
description: This is a demo-like student artwork, of a three-dimensional, story driven sci-fi fantasy. A free-to-roam, what-if art project made by Ahlman Institute Game Technology and Visual Game Design students, that is set in a time when humanity is scarce.

name: Witch Combat
description: Witch Combat - 2d arcade game, where you as flying Witch must win in every year competition of Dark Lands

name: Life ed
description: Life ed it's not just a game, it's an unique experience.

name: Click Legends
description: Join your Legendary Heroes in a battle for strength in CLICK LEGENDS. A Clicker - Incremental - Management game. Battle your way through a variety of enemies by leveling up your heroes, empowering them, and finding them equipment! Click your way to victory!

name: Gold Express
description: Welcome to the project code-named “Gold Express”, it is an asymmetric multiplayer competitive game in which you can get brand new escaping experiences with your teammates of all kinds of abilities on the strategic maps.

name: Seed Hunter
description: Seed Hunter is a 2D Platformer with Roguelite element. You’re the alien finding the missing source around universe, but you get into some trouble on the planet of Earth.

name: Killsquad
description:
Hack and slash? Check. Twin-stick-shooter? Check. 4 player coop to slay hordes of aliens & bosses with your friends? Check. Skills, upgrades, weapons, gears, talismans and more to make you stronger? Check. Wake up, bounty hunter. We have a mission for you. Time to clean up the scum of the galaxy.

Welcome to Killsquad: a co-op action game that blends twin-stick shooter, hack and slash and drops in a dash of character customization & progression. Join us on a journey to five planets full to the brim with enemies for you to annihilate. Choose your hero, select your skills, weapons, gears and talismans, and unleash hell through waves of relentless enemies and fearsome bosses.

name: Weaving
description: Weaving is a relaxing, minimalist reaction game.

name: Morningdew Farms: A Gay Farming Game
description: Sweet southern boy Cody always dreamed of living off the land. Now he's taken over his granddaddy's farm and can begin a wonderful new life in the village of Morningdew--a notorious Gayborhood!

name: Signs of the Sojourner
description: Signs of the Sojourner is a narrative deck-building game about relationships and communication. As you explore the world your experiences will change you. How will you grow? What will you leave behind? Who will you become?

name: Gregor Hills Haunted Hospital
description: Gregor Hills Haunted Hospital is a Top Down survival horror game based on the story of one of the most Haunted hospitals located in Gregor Hills.

name: Death Inn
description: A group of people who didn't know each other found a dead body in a haunted house called 【Death Inn】. And when this group of people returned to the lobby again, ready to leave the place,The door has was no longer there......

name: Zombie Apocalypse Mini Golf
description: Grab a baseball bat and a zombie head, and do some Virtual Reality putting in the destroyed aftermath of the apocalypse!

name: Art of Rally
description: Race in the golden era of rally. Drive iconic cars from the 60s to Group B on challenging stages through stylized environments. Will you master the art of rally?

name: Space War: Infinity
description: Space War: Infinity is a semi-procedural shoot-'em-up with a System of upgrades of the ship and unlocking of items.

name: Kumacure
description: An exhilarating 2D action game that defeats enemies with jumps and shots! Kumacure fights to defeat the evil corps aiming at the earth. It was created with the Pixel Game Maker MV.

name: Call of the Void
description: Call of the Void is a narrative strategy game which follows a recluse who winds up on a series of break and enter vigilante missions while looking for clues of his brother's disappearance.

name: Deck Box Dungeons
description: A companion app for the Deck Box Dungeons board game. Deck Box Dungeons is a cooperative fantasy themed dungeon crawler.

name: Castle Woodwarf 2
description: Keep your dragon and city of Woodwarf safe with help of your dwarven army. Upgrade your home and environment while you fight epic battles underground! Use dragon breath or special items and strategically scorch enemies.

name: BloXoR
description: BloXoR, an original puzzle game with a tilt! Take the dexterity of the average marble-in-a-box game and add a puzzle-solving twist-- all of the Blox move! Tilt and slide the Blox, rearrange them, reconfigure them, each level is a custom designed puzzle box with its own unique solution, part puzzle, part dexterity.

name: Dark Space Conqueror
description: An epic combat strategy game in which your strategy and robots strength will define your destiny over the fight against other commanders. Attack planets to obtain resources or destroy the army of hundreds rebels, all while you explore and unlock the secrets of this beautiful universe.

name: E06-Anomaly
description: Discover together with Expedition Unit 06 new worlds. Solve the mystries of ancient civilizations and fight with his energy bow for survival.

name: T Simulator
description: This is a sandbox simulator... an actual sandbox!

name: Chronac
description: Chronac is a fast paced action-platformer with lots of acrobatics, an arsenal of futuristic carnage and two very determined robots.

name: Pushtastic
description: A casual strategy game that tests your quick action, puzzle solving or its combination or else. Same rule, you can get code of my next game from me if you pass the final level! (See "About" section below for details) Also, the more games you passed, the better result you will get in the Global Rank!!

name: Selfloss
description: Selfloss is an emotional exploration game filled with rich lore, set in a whale-worshipping, Slavic-inspired world. Embark on the journey of the healer, Kazimir, and his magical staff as he fights a mysterious Miasma in search of a ritual to cure his wounded soul.

name: Oik Memory: Endgame
description: Oik Memory: Endgame is a great way to experience your memory! At each level, from 1 to 9 cubes are disguised, the arrangement of which you need to remember. At first, you just need to memorize where the necessary elements are, but with each new level the game begins to throw a new challenge to the player: the cubes begin to move around the stage, mix and even spin in a circle!

name: Inori's House
description: There’s a strange house at the corner of your town, and people from your town have been disappearing. It’s time to figure out the secrets and wonders at Inori’s House.

name: The Battles of Spwak
description: A highly challenging Turn-Based Battle Game with Unique Battles. Help a Protagonist and his companions complete a not-that-epic Adventure. Use dozens of different Strategies to defeat the ever-changing Challenges of each Battle and revel in Spwak's heroism.

name: Alluris
description: Prepare to embark in a journey like no other in Alluris. Play as a reluctant hero or villain to save the world… or just save a colony of bears from some lumberjacks. However you play, you’re sure to walk away with a few crazy stories about your adventure.

name: The Legends of Class One
description: One day, in a certain class of a technical school, an incident caused by the absence of class, the whole class was kidnapped by the teacher to a different world. But seven lucky ones escaped, and then they struggled with the teacher to save the class and return to the real world.

name: Flowerless Gardenia
description: The protagonist Shirosaki Hyou was originally a killer, but everything changed after she met a weird man.

name: Beyond the Dawn
description: After ending her many years of adventure, Minnie Pemesia decided to go to the Rocker Town to open a coffee shop. Since she met a weird man, everything changed...

name: Flowering Across the Hakugyokurou
description: 《Flowering Across the Hakugyokurou》is a short Vision Novel Touhou Project Fan Fiction game. The main story is about a love story of Yuyuko and Yukari. This game will tell a story that happened before Yuyuko died.

name: Memory of Torenia
description: Memory of Torenia is a warm and healing visual novel.In the spring of the second semester of Senior two, Zou Jin met her new classmate named Zhuge Xia and they became deskmates. Completely different in personality, they should have been strangers to each other.

name: Click & Click
description: Click on monsters, collect coins, buy upgrades and go from beginning to end, becoming the most successful clicker!

name: Golf Defied
description: Golf Defied is a new trend in the sphere already established for many ideas, both about Golf and video games. We have tried to realize as much possibilities as possible on the base of Golf concept. We hope that after trying the game, you will most of your requirements.

name: Old Gods Rising
description: As the consultant for a maverick director's new film: "Old Gods Rising," Professor Tom Winston arrives at Ashgate University to find that things are not quite as they seem. Has he become the unwitting star of Kayfer’s latest project? Or, has he stumbled into something far more sinister?

name: Dark Skeleton Survival
description: Dark Skeleton Survival is a Single-player, survival game. You go on a journey to defeat the bad mage.

name: Kindergarten 2
description: Welcome to Kindergarten 2, which takes place on Tuesday! After the events of Monday, you'll find yourself in a new school with new friends...and new ways to get ruthlessly murdered.

name: Little One
description: "Can you take him in for a while?" - One fateful night an old friend drops by with an orphan boy and asks me to take him in. And not just any boy - there seem to be some hidden secrets bubbling just beneath the surface of that innocent face.

name: Quartermaster
description: Yearly, thousands of agents die all around the world, due to gadget malfunctions! Become a manager of a secret laboratory and create the most ingenious inventions you could ever think of. Make sure to deliver the highest quality gear, and shut down your industry competitors. Agents' safety is in your hands!

name: reYal
description: Play as you playing as you to solve the puzzle.

name: Stay in the Light
description: Stay in the Light is an immersive first person horror game with a combination of unique features: Real-time Ray Tracing and random dungeon generator.

name: Scarytales: All Hail King Mongo
description: In this thrilling hidden object adventure the evil sorcerer Zarrar has returned to take vengeance upon your family and the kingdom from which he was banished years ago. After possessing your brother's mind through his dark magic, Zarrar seems to be unstoppable! Or can you find out, how to stop him?

name: Quest? Quest!
description: Take control of a hero in a completely ordinary and not at all suspicious fantasy kingdom. Will you accept your quest, train with knights, fight dragons, witches, and orcs to save damsels in distress?

name: Tank
description: Sin descripción

name: She Sees Red
description: She Sees Red is an interactive live-action thriller full of drama, violence, and your responsibility. A detective is doing her best to catch an elusive criminal who murdered several people in a night club. Make different choices to affect the plot line and reveal all pieces of the puzzle.

name: Hyper Bit Chasm
description: Hyper Bit Chasm is an epic adventure game filled with fast paced action every step of the way. Embark down a deep and treacherous chasm utilizing a brilliant 8-bit retro aesthetic!

name: Jwing: The Next Puzzle Game
description: An indie casual strategy game with fascinating gameplay mechanics. Think Tetris meets a match three bubble shooter with a dynamically changing field. Easy to learn, difficult to master, with endless replay value. Develop strategies and unlock features to climb up levels and achieve the best score.

name: Niara: Rebellion of the King Visual Novel RPG
description: Explore the vast land of Kruuthvaal, fight enemies and restore peace in the kingdom in this Visual Novel RPG

name: Polities
description: Polities is a real-time strategy and nation simulation game.

name: The Final Image
description: Experimental cinematic VR experience

name: Return to Cube Planet
description: Return to Cube Planet is a retro style first person shooter in a sci-fi setting where you are stranded on an unknown planet and you have to find and fight your way through different dangerous places and enemies.

name: Cavity Busters
description: Cavity Busters is a bullet hell tooth-punk rogue-lite with procedural elements. Chomp your way through tough as teeth enemies and the dreaded Pearly Knights, a true test of your enam-mettle. Collect upgrades AND diseases to enhance your agility and control over your one and only tooth.

name: Legends of Catalonia
description: Enter an epic adventure, traveler. Catalonia awaits you and you must help the knight Sant Jordi to recover the secrets of his lost diary. Join an adventure in the hands of illustrious travel companions and overcome the challenges that await you in a world of dreams, legends and fantasy.

name: Legends of Catalonia
description: Sin descripción

name: Upgrade the game 2
description:
Upgrade the game 2 is a game where your objective is to upgrade the game from something poor to a beautiful game, You will need to eliminate enemies in space in order to get coins and buy upgrades. 
 
You can upgrade everything that you can imagine! the graphics, sounds, menus, animations, skills, space, bombs ... ABSOLUTELY EVERYTHING!. 
 
In space, you will defeat different enemies with bombs and "The Laser" which has many types of ammunition. 
On every planet enemies will have different stats which make the game more different and funny. 
 
Your own phone will be there to explain everything and give us a fun and humorous touch. 
 
An epic sequel after the success of Upgrade the game . Here comes Upgrade the game 2! 
 
Upgrade the game 2 FEATURES: 
 
-The bombs fall where you put your finger 
-More than 20 skills to level up to help us in the fight 
-More than 200 dynamic levels with different mechanical 
-More than 42 different upgrades with more than 4 levels 
-15 Planets to explore with different properties 
-3D Models can be viewed from the shop

name: Outlaw Tales: Survival Online
description: Welcome to Outlaw Tales stranger. You are about to start your story as an outlaw. How the life of your character will develop depends on you. - Do you want to be the outlaw most wanted by law? In Outlaw you can! You can walk the path of dishonor, join a gang of thieves, shoot the outlaws in the back before they challenge you to a duel, steal a poor old man who only asks for help ... - Do you prefer to help the law and dress the silver star? Do not hesitate to help the sheriff when he asks for it. There are many characters that will need your help in the vast and hard west. Be an example to follow! -Want to have fun and seek to be in the top positions of the ranking? This is Outlaw. The events have a touch of personal humor and uniquely prepared by our writers. Enjoy finding out what happens behind each response, you will not regret it, or, investigate and try to advance within each story. There are surprises that only the most astute can discover.

name: Road to Rage
description: Soothe your road rage by unloading a hood-mounted gun on your erratic fellow drivers. Can you get to your destination with your sanity intact?

name: Indie Puzzle Bundle Vol. 1
description:
Entertain your brain with four perfectly perplexing puzzle games! This bundle contains Glass Masquerade, Letter Quest Remastered, Pipe Push Paradise, and Slayaway Camp: Butcher’s Cut. 
 
Glass Masquerade: Complete beautiful and intricately designed stained-glass jigsaw puzzles. No time limits. No stress. Just relaxing gameplay and a calming experience.  
 
Letter Quest Remastered: Use the awesome power of words to battle a motley crew of monsters and make your way through 40 stages of letter-slinging brawls in this turn-based puzzle RPG. 
 
Pipe Push Paradise: Restore an island utopia to its former glory by pushing pipes around in this challenging, plumbing-based puzzle game. 
 
Slayaway Camp: Butcher’s Cut: A killer puzzle game and darkly comic homage to 80s horror movies where you control Skullface, a homicidal slasher hell-bent on revenge.

name: Dead or Alive 6: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
With brand-new stages and action, DOA6 embodies and illustrates the evolution of true fighting entertainment!

Digital Deluxe Edition Bonuses
- Digital Deluxe Edition Bonus Costume - Kasumi
- Additional Character: Phase 4
- Deluxe Costume Set (25 costumes)
- Deluxe BGM Set (3 tracks)

name: Spirinse
description:
Spirinse is an action-adventure game. In Spirinse you take control of your spirit animal inside your spiritual world. This spiritual world has lost its balance, and your character travels through each of the seven chakra realms in this world to bring aspects of this world back into balance. 
 
Unique Selling Points : 
- A contrast between tense combat- and relaxing exploration segments. 
- Exploration Segments are usually relaxing and peaceful. 
- Discover and resolve environmental- and physics based puzzles. 
- Feel free as a bird as you traverse through handcrafted sceneries. 
- Use your abilities and the environment to uncover secrets and shortcuts. 
- The same physics system can be used to outsmart enemies in the game. 
- A world that adapts and grows as you bring each chakra (boss fight) back into balance. 
- This also includes character growth and progression such as new abilities and new ways to traverse the world. 
- A huge focus on creating a detailed and beautiful 2.5D environment in an eastern calligraphic artstyle. 
- A narrative filled with eastern philosophy about topics such as meditation and living in the present.

name: Dynasty Warriors 9: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: MENA Speed
description: Sin descripción

name: Hand of Fate: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Virtual Mirror
description:
If the hero of a video game walks through a secret door in the level and suddenly finds himself in the marketing department of his publisher, where he inevitably falls in love with the assistant, then it should become clear quickly: This is no ordinary tale told. 
 
And this is only the beginning of The Virtual Mirror, a fusion of games, rock and music theatre, which the two authors Stefan Wurz (music) and Wolfgang Walk (story) have worked on for a long time to present to the world: With a trailer aiming to show the potential of a CD and stage production to take the project to the next level.

name: Slime Rancher: Secret Style Pack
description:
Discover the secret styles of all your favorite slimes with the super stylish Secret Style Pack—an all-new downloadable content pack for Slime Rancher! 
 
“Secret styles” are a brand new type of 7Zee tech which allows you to give your slimes a fresh, new look! Once discovered, you will be able to re-style every slime of that type whenever you choose. Each style can be toggled between in the ranch house at any time for any slime. Mix and match original slimes and new slime styles to create hundreds of combinations!

name: Hungry Baby: Party Treats!
description: You have one “simple task” – feed the baby. Now how hard can it be? Well any parent will tell you it is hard. Sometimes it can be as hard as trying to keep up with your E3 appointments calendar. Or fighting the last boss in Dark Souls. Or telling your boss you won’t be able to take overtime anymore. And you want a raise. At the very same time. Or… well let’s just agree feeding your baby can be hard. Like really, REALLY hard. And as we all know, because it’s no secret – a hungry baby is an angry baby. All goes bad when it gets mad.

name: Dark Nights with Poe and Munro
description: Guide radio hosts Poe and Munro through six episodes of supernatural FMV adventure in the strange town of August! From the creators of award winning FMV games The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker and The Shapeshifting Detective.

name: Rescue HQ: The Tycoon
description: Build up your headquarters from scratch and design your own masterpiece. In Rescue HQ you build, organize and manage a joint station for firefighters, police, and ambulance. Manage your resources wisely and master challenging emergencies to keep your city safe! Are you up to the challenge?

name: Follia: Dear Father
description: Follia: Dear Father is a stealth survival horror that captures the genre’s essence in the halls and rooms of a university campus. Marcus goes in search of his parents, but instead finds himself struggling for his life against deadly horrors that creep around every corner.

name: Okira GO - Endless 3D Platformer Runner
description: Run, Jump, Dash & Play in Style! Use Okira's Powerful Abilities to Avoid Hazards, Gather health Pick-ups and Go as Far as You Can.

name: Heroine of the Sniper
description: A light-hearted FPS. Jam-packed with 15 missions, each with a different theme. Take out various targets, everything from trains, cars, to bombs and helicopters. Everything EXCEPT people!

name: Exurgo
description: Exurgo is a rogue-lite shooter built for roomscale VR. Fight your way up the Spire, an alien space elevator. Find secrets, collect power-ups and defeat bosses. Careful, each death will send you back to the start, but let you upgrade for your next ascent. Can you destroy the Spire and save the world?

name: The Last Door: Complete Edition
description:
Feel what it's truly like to be alone in the dark with this low-res, high-suspense point-and-click horror adventure.

Set in Victorian England, when Jeremiah Devitt receives a letter from his old schoolmate Anthony Beechworth with a hidden, cryptic message, he knows something is wrong. His journey to an abandoned manor is only the beginning as he starts to remember a long-buried secret from his youth, discovering things man was not meant to know, and opening doors that should have remained closed…

description: Engage in fast-paced 2v2 team battles filled with the craziness you’ve come to love from BlazBlue, with all the tight mechanics, smooth gameplay, and gorgeous 2D graphics you expect from Arc System Works. Choose from an eclectic cast of over 20 fighters. Jin Kisaragi, Rachel Alucard, Yosuke Hanamura and more are ready to join the fray!

name: MediEvil: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
MediEvil is a modern reimagining of the 1998 action-adventure game MediEvil. Developed by Other Ocean Emeryville and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment, it was released exclusively for the PlayStation 4 on October 25, 2019.

The game retains the original’s story, following Sir Daniel Fortesque, a skeletal knight resurrected to defeat the evil sorcerer Zarok and save the kingdom of Gallowmere. The remake features completely overhauled graphics, updated controls, and re-recorded audio, while maintaining the classic gameplay elements, humor, and gothic aesthetic that defined the original.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
• Super Armour in-game armour set
• The Art of MediEvil digital art book
• Digital comic book
• Original soundtrack
• Dynamic theme

name: Darkness Rollercoaster: Ultimate Shooter Edition
description: The ultimate rail shooter in this corner of the Galaxy !

name: Prey: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Prey is a first-person sci-fi action game from Arkane Studios, the award-winning creators of the Dishonored franchise. Known for their creative gameplay, distinctive worlds, and immersive stories, Arkane reimagines this franchise from the ground up, with an added psychological twist. Prey Digital Deluxe includes Prey, Prey: Mooncrash DLC, and the free Mooncrash update, Prey: Typhon Hunter.

name: Street Fighter V - Chun-Li Costumes Bundle
description: This DLC adds different costumes for Chun-Li.

name: Kaleidoscope
description: Kaleidoscope consists of level-paintings, which differ in style and behavior, yet are controlled in a similar fashion with the help of just four buttons. The simplicity of the controls is overcompensated by the rich audio/visual experience presented within the game. Player’s responses to a constantly changing environment shall have an impact on both image and audio. This creates an illusion of a player being simultaneously a painter of the current image and a composer of the music heard. In addition to that, each level in Kaleidoscope has a clear defined goal, which opens up doors of an infinite synaesthesia world to the masses.

name: Street Fighter V - Ryu Costumes Bundle

name: Verti-Go Home!
description:
Verti-Go Home! is an endless runner, set in a 90s Space Western Universe.
You fly through (and above) a tunnel, that you steer with your head, to avoid collisions with bizarre and dangerous obstacles. This is VR. The doors of perception are open.

If you think you have seen it all.... Enjoy the ride or Verti-Go Home!

name: Stellaris: Console Deluxe Edition
description: Featuring the same deep strategic gameplay, rich and diverse alien races and emergent storytelling, Stellaris: Console Edition puts the complexity of the galaxy at your thumbsticks. Whether you're exploring the unknown, discovering the mysteries of the universe, or conquering it for the glory of your empire, console players have more inter-galactic strategy awaiting them than ever before.

name: ACA Neo Geo: Crossed Swords
description: Crossed Swords is an action game released by SNK in 1991. In order to defeat the demon Nausizz, use Weapon Attacks, Magic Attacks, and your Defend ability as you make your way through seven intense stages. Up to two players can play simultaneously with the unique 3D perspective. Buy weapons with accumulated GOLD. Characters also grow in strength through an RPG-like system.

name: Minecraft Earth
description:
"Minecraft Earth is an all-new augmented reality game you can play on your mobile devices that brings the Minecraft world into our universe! Through the lens of the game, you’ll be able to build creations with friends and place them in the real world at life-size. You’ll discover exciting new mobs to use in your builds. And you may need to put your survival skills to the test as you explore a new side to your neighborhood and battle Minecraft mobs in real life!"

The game received its final update in January 2021 and officially shut down on 30 June 2021 due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

name: TS2: Train Signalling Simulator
description: An open source railway simulation game where you have to dispatch trains across an area and keep them on schedule.

name: Alien Creeps
description: Alien Creeps TD is a tower defense strategy game in which you have to protect the Earth from an alien invasion. You will be able to blow them up, to strike them down or to exterminate them with the help of your helicopter.

name: Crowd City
description:
Control the biggest crowd of the city!
Gather a maximum of people, invade the streets and crush your opponents!

name: Puffle Launch App
description: Dedicated to the take off - Club Penguin's intrepid puff must be propelled into the air when a poorly-lunged crab steals all his favorite berries!

name: Ark: Survival Evolved: Explorer's Edition
description: Combining the base game with 3 massive Expansion Packs, ARK: Survival Evolved Explorer's Edition is a ultimate way to get even more dinosaur action! The Explorer's Edition gives you access to the mega hit ARK: Survival Evolved as well as the Scorched Earth, Aberration, and Extinction Expansion Packs, adding nearly 900 hours of gameplay!

name: Boxing
description: The aptly-title Boxing is a relatively simple budget boxing game. The game offers an arcade-style boxing experience with ten colorful characters to choose from. Three modes are available: Ranking Mode, which has you fighting to become the top ranked boxer in the world; Scout Mode, which has you seeking new talent in order to unlock characters; and Battle Mode, where two players can fight an exhibition match against each other.

name: Jump Force: Ultimate Edition
description:
For the first time ever, the most famous Manga heroes are thrown into a whole new battleground: our world. Uniting to fight the most dangerous threat, the Jump Force will bear the fate of the entire human kind.

JUMP FORCE - Ultimate Edition includes :

- The game
- The Characters Pass: 9 additional characters + their respective costumes and moves for your Avatar + 4 days of early access to play with those characters before everyone else.
- 16 exclusive T-shirts for your Avatar
- A Jump Starter Pack of in-game items

name: The Telltale Batman Bundle
description:
The Telltale Batman Bundle is a digital bundle which contains both seasons of Batman: The Telltale Series, 10 episodes in total. The content included in this bundle is:

- Batman: The Telltale Series (episodes 1-5)
- Batman: The Telltale Series - The Enemy Within (episodes 1-5)

name: Dying: Reborn Ultimate Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: NomNoms
description:
"NomNoms are cute little monsters that just want to munch, or NOM, on yummy foods, called "NOMS"... which are stored in surprise eggs, a.k.a. 'NOM-tainers'... Confused by our misNOMers?! Lol, great!

To make things even more pheNOMenal, a veNOMous witch has stolen all the eggs and placed them at astroNOMical heights! NO.My.Gosh!

Hold up! All this NOMenclatorial wordplay is exhausting! Time for a NOMent of zen. OMMMMM. OM. UM. NUM. NOM. NOMMMMM... and we're back!!!

Become a pheNOM and help the NomNoms serve up a healthy scoop of kawaii justice by launching them at trigoNOMetrically precise angles to retrieve their tasty treats.

After all you can't have NomNoms without NOMS! L.O.L.

Not cut out for all these oNOMatopoeia-based puns?! Too bad! We'll rope you in with kawaii graphics and hilarious descriptions. You can even NOMinate a friend to join!"

name: Lazy Raise the Earth

name: Hegemone Pass
description: Hegemone Pass is a Stealth JRPG set in the Greek Underworld, where combat and exploration are tied together by an alert system. Follow the story of the goddess Persephone, the Queen of the Underworld… who got her title has been stolen by her very mother, Demeter! With the Underworld being ruled by her mother, Persephone must now survive against her very own citizens who are hunting her down, and retrieve her title and rulership of the Underworld.

name: Horgihugh
description: Horgihugh is a challenging horizontal side-scrolling shooter from Japanese developer Pixel. Developed by a team of industry veterans, Horgihugh mixes old with new to deliver a beautiful retro shoot 'em up experience that sports vibrant pixel graphics, intense boss battles, a unique power-up system, unlockable upgrades, and an adorable roster of anthropomorphic characters.

name: EA Sports UFC 3: Deluxe Edition

name: Call of Duty: WWII - Gold Edition
description:
The Call of Duty: WWII Gold Edition includes DLC Pack 1 - The Resistance plus Digital Edition Bonus Content: 1,100 Call of Duty: WWII Points.*

Call of Duty: WWII creates the definitive World War II next generation experience across three different game modes: Campaign, Multiplayer and Zombies. Continue the epic scale of war with DLC Pack 1 for Call of Duty: WWII - The Resistance.

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Premium Edition
description:
Mortal Kombat 11 is the latest installment in the critically acclaimed franchise, providing a deeper and more personalized experience than ever before.

The Mortal Kombat 11 Premium Edition includes:
• Main Game
• Kombat Pack

The Kombat Pack includes:
• 6 new DLC playable characters, released over time
• 7 exclusive Character Skins
• 7 exclusive sets of gear

The physical Premium Edition had a steelbook case and came with a download code for the Kombat Pack.
This edition was removed from purchase on digital stores after the announcement of the Aftermath expansion.
A new edition, Mortal Kombat 11: Aftermath Kollection, and bundle, Mortal Kombat 11: Aftermath + Kombat Pack, seem to be the direct replacements.

name: Age of Fear 4: The Iron Killer
description: Play as Angela, a fearless young Vampire Hunter on the trail of a brutal murderer. Along with a mysterious Nazell, embark on an epic quest into the heart of the criminal underworld. Age of Fear is a deep and complex turn-based strategy series (full of humour!) that fuses a tabletop wargame with RPG elements.

name: Luna Sky RDX
description: Retro-like exploration platformer with modern graphics and physics-based gameplay. Run, slide, dash, skate, swing and blow things up!

name: Hearts Deluxe
description: Hearts is a trick-taking game where players try to go for the lowest score possible by avoiding any Hearts and especially the Queen of Spades. This deluxe version has great controls and graphics, difficulty settings for the AI players, and two additional game modes: Hooligans Mode and Omnibus Mode.

Borderlands 2 Ultimate Edition offers more value than ever before. Play as one of six Vault Hunters facing off in a massive world of creatures, psychos, and the evil mastermind Handsome Jack. Make new friends, arm them with a bazillion weapons and fight together in 4-player co-op or split-screen on a relentless quest for revenge and redemption on the planet Pandora.

Includes: Captain Scarlett and her Pirate’s Booty! Mr. Torgue’s Campaign of Carnage! Sir Hammerlock’s Big Game Hunt! Tiny Tina’s Assault on Dragon Keep! Both Ultimate Vault Hunter Upgrade Packs! Mechromancer Character Pack! Psycho Character Pack! All 5 Headhunter DLC packs!

name: Jump Force: Deluxe Edition
description:
For the first time ever, the most famous Manga heroes are thrown into a whole new battleground: our world. Uniting to fight the most dangerous threat, the Jump Force will bear the fate of the entire human kind.

JUMP FORCE - Deluxe Edition includes :

- The game
- The Characters Pass: 9 additional characters + their respective costumes and moves for your Avatar + 4 days of early access to play with those characters before everyone else.

name: Dungeon Service
description:
There are thousands of adventurers out there eager to enter a dungeon and test their strength, slay an enemy or two and collect some treasure. Did you ever stop to wonder who prepares the dungeons for these adventurers? 
'Dungeon Service' is one of the top companies taking care of lighting the candles, sweeping the floors and making it overall cozy for the next adventurer. You play as one of their staff, a demon condemned for eternity to clean and prepare the dirty dungeons for the next adventurer. 
 
This is a game about the other side of the Dungeon. 
This is a non-violent game.

name: Ride 3: Gold Edition
description:
Enjoy the most complete gaming experience with RIDE 3 Gold Edition.
This edition contains: Full game, Season Pass, Credits Multiplier, Sport Bikes Pack and BMW R 1200 GS Pack.

name: Great Artists Steal
description:
Handprint Games is collaborating with a local artist, SCR1BBLE, to create a beautiful new hand-drawn indie game: Great Artists Steal.

'Great Artists Steal' is a hand-drawn platformer in which you play a scribbled character in a 2-dimensional scribbled world, trying to steal famous masterpieces. Steal a new painting in each level before your ink runs out.

name: Climb!
description: A 2D mountain climbing simulation taking place on some of the most dangerous mountains around the world with a touch of ridiculous hyper-violence!

name: Mori and the Whisper
description: Mori and The Whisper is a fast-paced game in which you get immersed in fable-driven puzzles through hundreds of themed stages while conquering several types of challenges.

name: Kawaii Home Design
description: "Love home decorate & makeover? Let's start your business with a showroom full of kawaii furniture. In this decorating game, you will choose the furniture and rearrange them accordingly to your clients' request but still had your style. Play one of the best DIY home design games today and let your creativity shine!"

name: Traffix
description:
Welcome to the wonderfully chaotic world of Traffix!

Control the flow of traffic with the tap of your finger! Watch out for obstacles like trains, trams & planes as you travel across 30 unique cities. Fix the conjestion problem or cause absolute chaos! The choice is yours in Traffix.

name: 300: Seize Your Glory
description:
300: Seize Your Glory (300: Abrazad la Gloria) is a spectacular action game in the third person, in which players can control Themistocles, one of the Spartan generals who will star in the new film of the 300 franchise. 
 
 
The players will be able to control Themistocles with the left thumb, moving it through the stages with total freedom, while with the right thumb they will be able to attack and defend themselves with the shield. Most of the time we will be using our weapons to fight the enemies, which will not give us a break. During the combats it will be possible to make combinations of blows and chain enemies' deaths, which will guarantee us more points. 
 
The biggest problem of 300: Seize Your Glory is that it is an extremely short game. It has an outstanding graphic section and spectacular scenarios, but they are very few. We will not take more than half an hour to have seen them all, which can be a problem for many players. 
 
300: Seize Your Glory is a funny and spectacular third person action game, that although it ends up too fast, it offers an intense and very bloody experience: ideal to warm up for the movie.

name: Nuts
description:
Find out where the squirrel keeps their stash!

You have 3 cameras, wired up to three TVs at your hideout. Each night, the squirrel leaves its home, goes to its stash, and returns home. You can place the cameras during daytime, and at night you can watch it run around. Can you find the tree that has the stash?

name: Heiankyo Alien
description: Heiankyo Alien takes place during the Heian Age when the city of Kyo is invaded by aliens. The aliens have been eating the people and devouring the city. As a Kebiishi, or knight, you decide to defend the city by burying the aliens alive. Your task is to run around areas set up like mazes and dig holes. The longer you hold down the button the larger the hole will be. Holes need to be placed strategically so as to trap the moving aliens and not to corner yourself. When an alien falls into a hole you must then refill the hole before they can escape. Defeat all 12 rounds to win the game. Play alone, against a friend, or team up with a friend to bury aliens alive in Heiankyo Alien.

name: Creep Rides
description: Creep Rides is a pack of 3 virtual reality rides on a track, just like the haunted mansion ride that you may have tried in an amusement park.

name: Power Brain Trainer
description: Funny and interesting exercises for brain training! Ukrainian developers’ team works on this great project which helps to upgrade your brain quickly.

name: Public Defense Corp
description: Years after her hometown was destroyed by an evil group, Haruka joins the company, Public Defense Corp. Now, armed with a bipedal robot, Haruka can work towards getting her revenge for what happened to her home.

name: Doomtank
description: Doomtank is a fast-paced twin-stick shooter designed to put you in the hot seat. Enter an ever-changing room straight from the depths of Hell and slay its inhabitants.

name: Drop Kick Zombie!
description: An arcade-style action game about a zombie who drop kicks lolis.

name: GourMelee
description: GourMelee is a 2-8 player local multiplayer party game where friends share controllers with their teammates to become the best chef in the kitchen

name: Incredible Dracula 3: Family Secret
description: Save Dracula from the unspeakable horror of pesky relatives in this thrilling new adventure! With colorful graphics, challenging missions, and a storyline full of laughs, Incredible Dracula III: Family Secret goes for the jugular and hits the funny bone!

name: Solarpower
description: Explore. Trade. Colonize. Solarpower is a space game unlike any you've seen before.

name: Transcender Starship
description: You are the captain of a starship. You must capture as many data pods as you can and make it to the star with them before your time expires.

name: Forge and Fight
description: You're a gladiator blacksmith. Forge absurd makeshift weapons and wield them in gladiatorial combat!

name: Ports of Call Classic
description: created by Rolf-Dieter Klein and Martin Ulrich The classic trade- and shippingsimulation Ports of Call. Create your own Shiptrading company.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Prophecy
description: Foul Tyranids rampaging on barren worlds; the mysterious Aeldari waging war on the Imperium; a prophecy that could change the fate of an entire Sector. Purge the unclean with the new Tech-Adept Inquisitor and carry out the Emperor's will in the grim Action-RPG "WH40k: Inquisitor - Prophecy".

name: BRG's Alice in Wonderland Visual Novel
description: Experience a fully voice acted, visualization of Lewis Carroll unaltered Alice's Adventures in Wonderland (originally released in 1865). Discover unique and original characters in the amazing world of Wonderland. Wonderful thrills for your heart and mind await in this timeless tale.

name: Orr
description: Orr is an off road racing game with open world exploration.

name: PsycoCat
description: You are the PsycoCat, an ultimate cat hooked to a balloon with an alien weapon After an apprenticeship against floating rocks you will be ready to fight the most terrible creatures of the world. Bull, rabbit, flying chicken and more await you for a terrible confrontation in the heavens.

name: Superstar Hero
description: A satirical and futuristic action-RPG set in a dystopian Quebec City. You are an enemy robot reprogrammed to be friendly and you are now forced to save the world against your very creator.

name: TheVeteranVR
description: This is a VR shooting game. You rule as a mercenary who has experienced a hundred wars, follow the world battlefield with different experience styles, earn commission by constantly fighting and achieving goals, so as to unlock more weapons and equipment, and get better game experience.

name: Cricket Captain 2019
description: Cricket Captain 2019 is the perfect companion for a hugely anticipated cricket season. With the World Cup and Australia in England, and the inaugural test-match championship, old rivalries will be put to the test and new ones created.

name: Rotatex
description: In the game you control Rotatex is a real cat from another dimension, we have to help him get to the portal in other rooms.

name: Viking Vengeance
description: Viking Vengeance is a Rogue-lite Dungeon Crawler ARPG set in a religiously oppressed medieval world. You play as a Templar with pagan origins who rediscovers his roots and learns to wield the powers of the Norse Gods forever changing the destiny of his people.

name: Ritbone
description: Ritbone is an adventure platform game. The game-play starts when our hero entered the underground world and you must help him by find keys, learning abilities and solving puzzles for saving his Teddy bear! The game-play is like old retro games but with a little fresh graphics and checkpoint system. We have tried to create a lot of Puzzles, mini-games and enemies to this game be more attractive for you...

name: The Incredible Adventures of Super Panda
description: A sinister rot has gripped Panda land. Super Panda embarks on an epic quest to find the source of the rot and save his beloved homeland. Join the Incredible Adventures of Super Panda on a gripping adventure to save his homeworld.

name: Doctor Who: The Edge of Time
description: "The Doctor has been hurled through time to the end of the universe. A virus that threatens to rip apart reality itself has been unleashed. Players can pilot the TARDIS on a journey across worlds both familiar and strange to recover a series of powerful time crystals that can repair spacetime and ultimately save the universe itself."

name: BonVoyage!
description: BonVoyage! is a drag tile puzzle game. Help stranded knights navigate floating islands by reconstructing path in challenging levels.

name: Strashilka
description: Sin descripción

name: Cardlings
description: A digital board game where the cards in your hand become units and buildings on the board. With lots of different units and unique abilities for each unit, there are countless strategies to achieve your goals.

name: Eternal Elements
description: Melt sand, shatter glass, and rust iron in this epic elemental tower defense game. Combine elemental effects to beat powerful materials. Use cunning strategy and wit to take on impossible challenges. Unlock new abilities and power as you embark on this difficult journey.

name: Quantum League
description: Quantum League is the first competitive arena shooter that injects a unique time travel mechanic into the tactical way you play the game. When the timer runs out, a 'time loop' feature revives & rewinds you, but THIS time, you get to team up with your own clones with paradoxical results!

name: The Penguin Factory
description: The Penguin Factory is a puzzle game in which you must guide penguins across conveyor belts, turntables, tubes and many other weird and wonderful contraptions into those all important delivery boxes. With 100 challenging levels and a level editor.

name: Asymmetric Ops
description: Join and experience the evolution of a 'hide & seek style PvP shooter' to a 'spiritual successor for the squad-based shooters of old', taken to the next level.

name: Where is my family
description: Where is my Family, or the story of a child looking for his missing parents. Find a few winks to classics of great adventure games.

name: Rocketboarder
description: Take flight on a rocket-powered hoverboard as you soar through fortified enemy strongholds. Lean your body to steer the board as you dodge enemy fire and blast robots in this made-for-VR action game.

name: Stroke Fill
description: A simple but addictive fill one line block puzzle game. Sharpen your mind with a connect-the-block-style one-line brain training puzzle game.

name: Village Feud
description: The 2 villages on the island don't get along very well. You are the mayor of one of these cities, grow your city, earn gold, buy troops and attack the other village. Defeat the other mayor and claim the island, play against your friends or try out singleplayer.

name: Insurgence: Second Assault
description: Insurgence - Second Assault is a follow-up sequel to Insurgence - Chains of Renegade. Features new characters and stories from two different points of view.

name: Ball Run
description: Ball Run is a very simple game, with a simple mechanics, but at the same time very fun, perfect for anyone, do not delay to try it!

name: Arranged
description: This is a story of Elif, an ordinary Turkish girl, who just moved back home after college graduation. Now it is time to get married. Luckily, her family saved her from the hassle of finding a husband. What would you do if you were in her shoes? Open-up your mind and experience the ups and downs of the traditions.

name: Meowk and Frocco
description: Meowk and Froggo - an action game that will test your reaction and teach you to adjust to timings, 14 levels of traps, dangers and weightlessness await you, control only the speed of rotation and your rocket pack.

name: Shattered Lights
description: Shattered Lights is a VR psychological horror room-scale experience, which focuses on drawing the player into the game with unparalleled immersion.

name: Collapsed
description: Collapsed is a post-apocalyptic roguelike action-platformer. Hunt your prey through vast procedurally-generated levels filled with tough enemies, useful loot and experience points. Fight alone or with a friend – either way, it won’t be easy!

name: Duncan and the Wisp
description: Top Down Action Adventure with click to move mechanics

name: Your Island: Kimi no Sima
description: Your people landed on a virgin forest island. Develop the island, build a house, make fields and barns, develop agriculture, fishery and industry, Let's develop into a wonderful island. It is a box-garden / sandbox-type simulation game that guides people and develops and develops islands.

name: Hunters For Your Brain
description: In the same lab where carried out experiments on the people the disaster occurred.

name: Houdini Redux
description: Houdini Redux is an easy to learn typing party game in which two players fight each other to gather the title of "Grand Magus". Different real mages to choose and to master.

name: Kakwitene VR
description: Fly around and touch colored pollen spheres to hear how to pronounce the color with Kanien’kéha dialect (Mohawk Language Dialect).

name: Random War
description: Control a customizable tank in a endless run, trying to get the highest rank.Each level is generated with different enemy sequences and the higher the level, the more different and difficult enemies will appear.

name: Xanarthraxia
description: Stalwart knight, align yourself for battle! Synchronize the energetic patterns within Xanarthraxia's ancient glyphs in this bite-sized casually competitive RPG clicker.

name: All Evil Night 2
description: This is a next story about a cop who witnessed strange events near the city Evilween. You will meet monsters from your nightmares.

name: Nevrosa: Spider Song
description: Giving a last look from observation deck, Conway could not expect what a journey lies ahead. Once shared his blood with this world, William starts an ancient ritual. Your blood has power here, but Blood Magic always attracts monsters even more dangerous than local creatures.

name: FinalAdventure
description: Partir à l'aventure... Un étrange phénomène est survenu suite à la collision d'une comète... Faite équipe avec des personnages que vous allez rencontrer au cours de votre périple. Saurez vous sauver ce monde avant qu'il ne meure ?...

name: Winds of Change - The Opening Act
description: Lead The Rebellion, build your army, and shape the world with your choices. A story-heavy adventure game with multiple endings, romance options, and non-linear storytelling. Inspired by Dragon Age, and Mass Effect. Fully voice acted by a stellar cast! Play the first act for FREE!

name: Adventure of Great Wolf
description: A PC Port of a classical v«kän (Vexen) game, Originally Developed by fäkhäßk II. It features an intriguing soundtrack and various fun puzzles!

name: Mural
description: A trip to find a way for the moon to be the sun.

name: Touhou Kikeijuu: Wily Beast and Weakest Creature
description: Touhou Kikeijuu: Wily Beast and Weakest Creature is the seventeenth official installment of the Touhou Project. It was announced by ZUN on his personal blog on April 17, 2019, at 14:02 JST. A playable demo was released on May 5, 2019, at Reitaisai 16. The full version was released August 12, 2019, at Comiket 96.

name: Drill Deal
description: Drill Deal is a unique simulator in a fun style that will draw you for hours. It's a building simulator like never before. Feel the thrill of a drill hitting underwater oil fields. Sell the precious substance and make your oil rig more efficient.

name: Sinner
description: Look into the darkest corners of consciousness. Find the way out of insanity.

name: Pocket Assault
description: In Pocket Assault you are pitted against infantry, snipers, jeeps, tanks, helicopters and drones. Hide behind protective barriers to stay alive while you aim and fire at enemy combatants. Some defeated opponents give you new weapons or additional health.

name: Nightmare
description: Have you ever wondered what is crawling around your bedroom? Creepy dolls, talking toys? Is you're inner self questioning what lurks under your bed at night...

name: Alpha King
description: Become the Alpha King as you dive into the dark fantasy world behind the beers of 3Floyds Brewery! It's a unique brew that blends the character progression, equipment, and drive of an action RPG with the time-tested mechanics and energy of a brawler!

name: Dissolving
description: Her ex-boyfriend became a shut-in. The girl goes to visit him... then things start to go wrong. They always do, right? Experience two stories about digital gods and loss. And remember - believe in the net.

name: Moonshiners: The Game
description: In Moonshiners you will build your own moonshining empire in the heart of the Appalachian Mountains and flood the area with the best moonshine in years. But be careful, any mistake can cost you your freedom or beating from the moonshine competition. Moonshiners is a fully-blown moonshine simulator!

name: Breach Point
description: Breach Point is a Sci-fi action adventure set in 1950, two protagonists stumble their way into the twist and turns of a time travelling adventure spanning multiple years and various extravagant locations.

name: Protogenisis
description: Shoot targets in a randomly generated level with screen-space aiming and multi-step reloading.
